name: Ice Reactions
description:
Fluid 3D/2,5D platformer with fire/ice and solids reactions. Travel a freezed world by being a fire life form and melts things around you. Action is non-stop since you begin a melting level. 

Controls (customisable) :

Move : W/A/S/D

Jump : Space bar

Fire : Left shift

NEW LEVELS WILL COME!

MADE BY LYNOX AND VEINARDY

For Weekly Game jam 170.
